text: United Nations in Geneva and President, Relator of the Working Group for the presentation of the report. Excellency, dear Ambassador, you have the floor.
speaker: SPEAKER_02

text: Thank you, Chairperson, Excellencies, Ladies and Gentlemen. I'm pleased to introduce the report of the 19th session of the Intergovernmental Working Group on the Effective Implementation of the Durban Declaration and Program of Action.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
